500000002.name: fishing_shop_00
500000002.chinesesimplified: 你来啦，今天有很多好东西呢
500000002.english: You're here! There are lots of good things today.

500000003.name: fishing_shop_01
500000003.english: Welcome! Please feel free to browse and buy.

500000004.name: fishing_shop_02
500000004.chinesesimplified: 今早的鱼篓都快装不下啦~
500000004.english: The fish basket was almost overflowing this morning.

500000005.name: fishing_shop_03
500000005.chinesesimplified: 你今天选购的东西真不少呢！
500000005.english: You’ve picked quite a lot today!

500000006.name: fishing_shop_04
500000006.chinesesimplified: 谢谢惠顾~下次给你更多的折扣
500000006.english: Thank you for your patronage~ Next time, I’ll give you an even bigger discount.

500000007.name: fishing_shop_05
500000007.chinesesimplified: 慢走啊～下次来给您看看我私藏的好货！
500000007.english: Take care~ Next time you come, I’ll show you some of my private

500000009.name: fishing_shop_07
500000009.chinesesimplified: 嘘...我在听海浪预报呢，待会儿告诉您最佳垂钓时间。
500000009.english: Shh... I’m listening to the sea forecast. I’ll tell you the best fishing time later.

500000010.name: fishing_shop_08
500000010.chinesesimplified: 海风捎来远方的消息，说今天会有贵客临门~
500000010.english: The sea breeze brings news from afar, saying that an honored guest will visit today.

500000011.name: fishing_shop_09
500000011.chinesesimplified: 听说周末的时候买食物会更便宜呢
500000011.english: I heard that food is cheaper on weekends.

500000012.name: fishing_shop_10
500000012.chinesesimplified: 想试试手气吗？我这儿连鱼竿都给您准备好啦~
500000012.english: Want to try your luck? I even have a fishing rod ready for you here.

500000013.name: fishing_shop_11
500000013.chinesesimplified: 昨天有条大鱼差点把我的钓竿拽跑啦~
500000013.english: Yesterday, a big fish almost pulled my fishing rod away!

500000014.name: fishing_shop_12
500000014.chinesesimplified: 嘿！快来瞧瞧有没有你中意的～
500000014.english: Hey!  Come take a look and see if there’s anything you like.

500000015.name: fishing_shop_13
500000015.chinesesimplified: 早起的鱼儿进筐早，早来的客人优惠少不了！
500000015.english: Early birds catch the worms, early customers get the best deals!

500000016.name: fishing_shop_14
500000016.chinesesimplified: 今儿个浪花特别给面子，送来一船银光闪闪的宝贝！
500000016.english: The waves were especially kind today, bringing a boatload of shiny treasures!

500000017.name: fishing_shop_15
500000017.chinesesimplified: 眼光真好！这绝对是今天最好的东西了~
500000017.english: You have great taste! This is definitely the best item today.

500000018.name: fishing_shop_16
500000018.chinesesimplified: 哎呀您真识货！看来今天是遇到行家了！
500000018.english: Wow, you really know your stuff! Seems like I’ve met an expert today.

500000019.name: fishing_shop_17
500000019.chinesesimplified: 下次有好东西我肯定跟你说！
500000019.english: Next time I have something good, I’ll definitely let you know.

500000020.name: fishing_shop_18
500000020.chinesesimplified: 听说周末的时候买食物会更便宜呢
500000020.english: I heard that food is cheaper on weekends.

500000021.name: fishing_shop_19
500000021.chinesesimplified: 要不要我给您推荐几款好鱼饵？
500000021.english: Would you like me to recommend some good bait?

500000022.name: fishing_shop_20
500000022.chinesesimplified: 我刚想找个人分享今天的垂钓小技巧呢！
500000022.english: I was just thinking of sharing today’s fishing tips with someone.

500000023.name: fishing_shop_21
500000023.chinesesimplified: 今天的云像鱼群一样好看！
500000023.english: The clouds today look like schools of fish!

500000024.name: fishing_shop_22
500000024.chinesesimplified: 潮水正在赶来的路上，要给您带什么惊喜呢？
500000024.english: The tide is on its way. What surprises will it bring you?

500000025.name: fishing_shop_23
500000025.chinesesimplified: 海星在张望，好奇今天第一位客人会是谁？
500000025.english: The starfish are gazing, curious about who the first customer of the day will be.
